<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <ScrollView xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:fillViewport="true" android:background="@color/white" tools:context=".AddLocationActivity">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="16dp">
<!-- Header Card --> <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" app:cardCornerRadius="12dp" app:cardElevation="4dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="@color/DeepForestGreen">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="16dp" android:gravity="center">
<ImageView android:layout_width="48dp" android:layout_height="48dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_add_location" app:tint="@color/GoldYellow" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Share a Hidden Gem" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:fontFamily="cursive" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Help other travelers discover amazing places!" android:textColor="@color/GoldSand" android:textSize="14sp" android:fontFamily="cursive" android:textAlignment="center" />
</LinearLayout> </androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
<!-- Instructional Video Card --> <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" app:cardCornerRadius="12dp" app:cardElevation="4dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="@color/white">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="16dp">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:layout_marginBottom="12dp">
<ImageView android:layout_width="24dp" android:layout_height="24dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_info" app:tint="@color/DeepForestGreen" android:layout_marginEnd="8dp" />
<TextView android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="How to Add a Location" android:textColor="@color/NavyBlue" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Tutorial" android:textColor="@color/GoldYellow" android:textSize="12sp" android:textStyle="italic" />
</LinearLayout>
<androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="120dp" android:clickable="true" android:focusable="true" app:cardCornerRadius="8dp" app:cardElevation="2dp">
<FrameLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent">
<ImageView android:id="@+id/iv_tutorial_thumbnail" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:scaleType="centerCrop" android:src="@drawable/ic_image_placeholder" />
<ImageView android:id="@+id/btn_play_tutorial" android:layout_width="48dp" android:layout_height="48dp" android:layout_gravity="center" android:background="@drawable/circle_background" android:padding="12dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_link" app:tint="@color/white" />
</FrameLayout> </androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
<TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:text="Watch this quick tutorial to learn how to add locations effectively" android:textColor="@color/light_gray" android:textSize="12sp" android:textAlignment="center" />
</LinearLayout> </androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
<!-- Progress Bar --> <ProgressBar android:id="@+id/progress_bar" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_gravity="center" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" android:visibility="gone" />
<!-- Form Card --> <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" app:cardCornerRadius="16dp" app:cardElevation="8dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="@color/white">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="24dp">
<!-- Location Name --> <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.TextInputLayout.OutlinedBox" app:boxStrokeColor="@color/DeepForestGreen" app:hintTextColor="@color/NavyBlue">
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/et_location_name" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:hint="Location Name *" android:inputType="textCapWords" android:textColor="@color/NavyBlue" android:fontFamily="cursive" />
</com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
<!-- Category --> <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout android:id="@+id/til_category" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.TextInputLayout.OutlinedBox.ExposedDropdownMenu" app:boxStrokeColor="@color/DeepForestGreen" app:hintTextColor="@color/NavyBlue">
<AutoCompleteTextView android:id="@+id/et_category" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:hint="Category *" android:inputType="none" android:textColor="@color/NavyBlue" android:fontFamily="cursive" />
</com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
<!-- Province --> <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout android:id="@+id/til_province" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.TextInputLayout.OutlinedBox.ExposedDropdownMenu" app:boxStrokeColor="@color/DeepForestGreen" app:hintTextColor="@color/NavyBlue">
<AutoCompleteTextView android:id="@+id/et_province" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:hint="Province *" android:inputType="none" android:textColor="@color/NavyBlue" android:fontFamily="cursive" />
</com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
<!-- City --> <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout android:id="@+id/til_city" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.TextInputLayout.OutlinedBox.ExposedDropdownMenu" app:boxStrokeColor="@color/DeepForestGreen" app:hintTextColor="@color/NavyBlue">
<AutoCompleteTextView android:id="@+id/et_city" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:hint="City *" android:inputType="none" android:textColor="@color/NavyBlue" android:fontFamily="cursive" android:enabled="true" />
</com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
<!-- Description --> <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.TextInputLayout.OutlinedBox" app:boxStrokeColor="@color/DeepForestGreen" app:hintTextColor="@color/NavyBlue" app:counterEnabled="true" app:counterMaxLength="3000">
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/et_description" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:hint="Description (Share detailed information about this amazing place) *" android:inputType="textMultiLine|textCapSentences" android:lines="6" android:maxLength="3000" android:textColor="@color/NavyBlue" android:fontFamily="cursive" />
</com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
<!-- Contributor Name --> <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.TextInputLayout.OutlinedBox" app:boxStrokeColor="@color/DeepForestGreen" app:hintTextColor="@color/NavyBlue">
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/et_contributor_name" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:hint="Your Name *" android:inputType="textPersonName|textCapWords" android:textColor="@color/NavyBlue" android:fontFamily="cursive" />
</com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
<!-- YouTube URL (Optional) --> <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="24dp" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.TextInputLayout.OutlinedBox" app:boxStrokeColor="@color/DeepForestGreen" app:hintTextColor="@color/NavyBlue">
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/et_youtube_url" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:hint="YouTube URL (Optional)" android:inputType="textUri" android:textColor="@color/NavyBlue" android:fontFamily="cursive" />
</com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
<!-- Image URL Input (Now Required) --> <TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Location Image *" android:textColor="@color/NavyBlue" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:fontFamily="cursive" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp" />
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="12dp" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.TextInputLayout.OutlinedBox" app:boxStrokeColor="@color/DeepForestGreen" app:hintTextColor="@color/NavyBlue">
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/et_image_url" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:hint="Image URL *" android:inputType="textUri" android:textColor="@color/NavyBlue" android:fontFamily="cursive" />
</com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
<!-- Image Preview --> <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="200dp" android:layout_marginBottom="12dp" app:cardCornerRadius="12dp" app:cardElevation="4dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="@color/offWhite">
<ImageView android:id="@+id/iv_selected_image" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:scaleType="centerCrop" android:visibility="gone" android:contentDescription="Selected location image" />
<!-- Placeholder when no image selected --> <LinearLayout android:id="@+id/layout_image_placeholder" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:orientation="vertical" android:gravity="center" android:alpha="0.6">
<ImageView android:layout_width="48dp" android:layout_height="48dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_image_placeholder" app:tint="@color/light_gray" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Enter image URL above and tap 'Load Image'" android:textColor="@color/light_gray" android:fontFamily="cursive" android:textAlignment="center" android:paddingHorizontal="16dp" />
</LinearLayout>
</androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
<!-- Load from URL Button --> <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/btn_load_url" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.Button.OutlinedButton" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="32dp" android:text="Load Image from URL" android:textColor="@color/DeepForestGreen" android:fontFamily="cursive" app:strokeColor="@color/DeepForestGreen" app:cornerRadius="8dp" app:icon="@drawable/ic_link" app:iconTint="@color/DeepForestGreen" />
<!-- Submit Button --> <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/btn_submit_location" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="56dp" android:backgroundTint="@color/DeepForestGreen" android:text="Share Location" android:textColor="@color/GoldYellow" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:fontFamily="cursive" app:cornerRadius="12dp" app:icon="@drawable/ic_share" app:iconTint="@color/GoldYellow" />
<!-- Progress Bar for loading states --> <ProgressBar android:id="@+id/progress_bar" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_gravity="center" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" android:visibility="gone" android:indeterminateTint="@color/DeepForestGreen" />
</LinearLayout> </androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
<!-- Info Card --> <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" app:cardCornerRadius="12dp" app:cardElevation="2dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="@color/GoldSand">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:padding="16dp" android:gravity="center_vertical">
<ImageView android:layout_width="24dp" android:layout_height="24dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_info" app:tint="@color/NavyBlue" android:layout_marginEnd="12dp" />
<TextView android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="Please provide a valid image URL (http/https). Use image hosting services like Imgur, Google Photos, or Dropbox for best results. Your contribution helps travelers discover amazing places!" android:textColor="@color/NavyBlue" android:textSize="12sp" android:fontFamily="cursive" />
</LinearLayout> </androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
</LinearLayout> </ScrollView>

<TextView android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="How to Add a Location" android:textColor="@color/NavyBlue" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Tutorial" android:textColor="@color/GoldYellow" android:textSize="12sp" android:textStyle="italic" />
</LinearLayout>
<androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="120dp" android:clickable="true" android:focusable="true" app:cardCornerRadius="8dp" app:cardElevation="2dp">
<FrameLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent">
<ImageView android:id="@+id/iv_tutorial_thumbnail" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:scaleType="centerCrop" android:src="@drawable/ic_image_placeholder" />
<ImageView android:id="@+id/btn_play_tutorial" android:layout_width="48dp" android:layout_height="48dp" android:layout_gravity="center" android:background="@drawable/circle_background" android:padding="12dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_link" app:tint="@color/white" />
</FrameLayout> </androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
<TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:text="Watch this quick tutorial to learn how to add locations effectively" android:textColor="@color/light_gray" android:textSize="12sp" android:textAlignment="center" />
</LinearLayout> </androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
<!-- Form Card --> <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" app:cardCornerRadius="16dp" app:cardElevation="8dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="@color/white">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="24dp">
<!-- Location Name --> <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.TextInputLayout.OutlinedBox" app:boxStrokeColor="@color/DeepForestGreen" app:hintTextColor="@color/NavyBlue">
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/et_location_name" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:hint="Location Name *" android:inputType="textCapWords" android:textColor="@color/NavyBlue" android:fontFamily="cursive" />
</com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
<!-- Category --> <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout android:id="@+id/til_category" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.TextInputLayout.OutlinedBox.ExposedDropdownMenu" app:boxStrokeColor="@color/DeepForestGreen" app:hintTextColor="@color/NavyBlue">
<AutoCompleteTextView android:id="@+id/et_category" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:hint="Category *" android:inputType="none" android:textColor="@color/NavyBlue" android:fontFamily="cursive" />
</com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
<!-- Province --> <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout android:id="@+id/til_province" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.TextInputLayout.OutlinedBox.ExposedDropdownMenu" app:boxStrokeColor="@color/DeepForestGreen" app:hintTextColor="@color/NavyBlue">
<AutoCompleteTextView android:id="@+id/et_province" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:hint="Province *" android:inputType="none" android:textColor="@color/NavyBlue" android:fontFamily="cursive" />
</com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
<!-- City --> <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout android:id="@+id/til_city" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.TextInputLayout.OutlinedBox.ExposedDropdownMenu" app:boxStrokeColor="@color/DeepForestGreen" app:hintTextColor="@color/NavyBlue">
<AutoCompleteTextView android:id="@+id/et_city" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:hint="City *" android:inputType="none" android:textColor="@color/NavyBlue" android:fontFamily="cursive" android:enabled="true" />
</com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
<!-- Description --> <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.TextInputLayout.OutlinedBox" app:boxStrokeColor="@color/DeepForestGreen" app:hintTextColor="@color/NavyBlue" app:counterEnabled="true" app:counterMaxLength="3000">
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/et_description" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:hint="Description (Share detailed information about this amazing place) *" android:inputType="textMultiLine|textCapSentences" android:lines="6" android:maxLength="3000" android:textColor="@color/NavyBlue" android:fontFamily="cursive" />
</com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
<!-- Contributor Name --> <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.TextInputLayout.OutlinedBox" app:boxStrokeColor="@color/DeepForestGreen" app:hintTextColor="@color/NavyBlue">
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/et_contributor_name" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:hint="Your Name *" android:inputType="textPersonName|textCapWords" android:textColor="@color/NavyBlue" android:fontFamily="cursive" />
</com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
<!-- YouTube URL (Optional) --> <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="24dp" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.TextInputLayout.OutlinedBox" app:boxStrokeColor="@color/DeepForestGreen" app:hintTextColor="@color/NavyBlue">
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/et_youtube_url" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:hint="YouTube URL (Optional)" android:inputType="textUri" android:textColor="@color/NavyBlue" android:fontFamily="cursive" />
</com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
<!-- Image URL Input (Now Required) --> <TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Location Image *" android:textColor="@color/NavyBlue" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:fontFamily="cursive" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp" />
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="12dp" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.TextInputLayout.OutlinedBox" app:boxStrokeColor="@color/DeepForestGreen" app:hintTextColor="@color/NavyBlue">
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/et_image_url" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:hint="Image URL *" android:inputType="textUri" android:textColor="@color/NavyBlue" android:fontFamily="cursive" />
</com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
<!-- Image Preview --> <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="200dp" android:layout_marginBottom="12dp" app:cardCornerRadius="12dp" app:cardElevation="4dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="@color/offWhite">
<ImageView android:id="@+id/iv_selected_image" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:scaleType="centerCrop" android:visibility="gone" android:contentDescription="Selected location image" />
<!-- Placeholder when no image selected --> <LinearLayout android:id="@+id/layout_image_placeholder" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:orientation="vertical" android:gravity="center" android:alpha="0.6">
<ImageView android:layout_width="48dp" android:layout_height="48dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_image_placeholder" app:tint="@color/light_gray" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Enter image URL above and tap 'Load Image'" android:textColor="@color/light_gray" android:fontFamily="cursive" android:textAlignment="center" android:paddingHorizontal="16dp" />
</LinearLayout>
</androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
<!-- Load from URL Button --> <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/btn_load_url" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.Button.OutlinedButton" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="32dp" android:text="Load Image from URL" android:textColor="@color/DeepForestGreen" android:fontFamily="cursive" app:strokeColor="@color/DeepForestGreen" app:cornerRadius="8dp" app:icon="@drawable/ic_link" app:iconTint="@color/DeepForestGreen" />
<!-- Submit Button --> <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/btn_submit_location" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="56dp" android:backgroundTint="@color/DeepForestGreen" android:text="Share Location" android:textColor="@color/GoldYellow" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:fontFamily="cursive" app:cornerRadius="12dp" app:icon="@drawable/ic_share" app:iconTint="@color/GoldYellow" />
<!-- Progress Bar for loading states --> <ProgressBar android:id="@+id/progress_bar" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_gravity="center" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" android:visibility="gone" android:indeterminateTint="@color/DeepForestGreen" />
</LinearLayout> </androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
<!-- Info Card --> <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" app:cardCornerRadius="12dp" app:cardElevation="2dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="@color/GoldSand">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:padding="16dp" android:gravity="center_vertical">
<ImageView android:layout_width="24dp" android:layout_height="24dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_info" app:tint="@color/NavyBlue" android:layout_marginEnd="12dp" />
<TextView android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="Please provide a valid image URL (http/https). Use image hosting services like Imgur, Google Photos, or Dropbox for best results. Your contribution helps travelers discover amazing places!" android:textColor="@color/NavyBlue" android:textSize="12sp" android:fontFamily="cursive" />
</LinearLayout> </androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
</LinearLayout> </ScrollView>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <ScrollView xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="@color/white" tools:context=".LocationDetailScreenActivity">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical">
<!-- Main Image --> <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="250dp" android:layout_margin="16dp" app:cardCornerRadius="12dp" app:cardElevation="4dp">
<FrameLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent">
<ImageView android:id="@+id/iv_main_image" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:scaleType="centerCrop" android:src="@drawable/ic_image_placeholder" />
<!-- Gradient overlay for better text readability --> <View android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="80dp" android:layout_gravity="bottom" android:background="@drawable/gradient_overlay" />
<!-- Category chip overlay --> <com.google.android.material.chip.Chip android:id="@+id/chip_category" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_gravity="top|end" android:layout_margin="12dp" android:text="Category" android:textColor="@color/white" app:chipBackgroundColor="@color/DeepForestGreen" />
</FrameLayout> </androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
<!-- Location Information --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginHorizontal="16dp" android:orientation="vertical">
<!-- Location Name --> <TextView android:id="@+id/tv_location_name" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp" android:text="Location Name" android:textColor="@color/NavyBlue" android:textSize="24sp" android:textStyle="bold" />
<!-- Category --> <TextView android:id="@+id/tv_category" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" android:text="Category" android:textColor="@color/light_gray" android:textSize="16sp" />
<!-- Description --> <TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="4dp" android:text="About this place" android:textColor="@color/NavyBlue" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tv_description" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" android:lineSpacingExtra="4dp" android:text="Description will be shown here..." android:textColor="@color/black" android:textSize="14sp" />
<!-- Contributor Information --> <TextView android:id="@+id/tv_contributor" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="4dp" android:text="Contributed by: Username" android:textColor="@color/DeepForestGreen" android:textSize="14sp" android:textStyle="italic" android:visibility="visible" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tv_contributed_date" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="24dp" android:text="Added on: Date" android:textColor="@color/light_gray" android:textSize="12sp" android:visibility="visible" />
</LinearLayout>
<!-- Action Buttons --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginHorizontal="16dp" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" android:orientation="vertical">
<!-- Get Directions Button --> <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/btn_get_directions" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.Button" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="56dp" android:layout_marginBottom="12dp" android:backgroundTint="@color/DeepForestGreen" android:text="Get Directions" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="16sp" app:cornerRadius="8dp" app:icon="@drawable/ic_directions" app:iconGravity="textStart" app:iconPadding="8dp" app:iconTint="@color/white" />
<!-- Watch Video Button --> <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/btn_watch_video" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.Button.OutlinedButton" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="56dp" android:layout_marginBottom="12dp" android:text="Watch Video" android:textColor="@color/DeepForestGreen" android:textSize="16sp" android:visibility="visible" app:cornerRadius="8dp" app:icon="@drawable/ic_link" app:iconGravity="textStart" app:iconPadding="8dp" app:iconTint="@color/DeepForestGreen" app:strokeColor="@color/DeepForestGreen" app:strokeWidth="2dp" />
<!-- Share Location Button --> <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/btn_share_location" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.Button.OutlinedButton" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="56dp" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" android:text="Share Location" android:textColor="@color/GoldYellow" android:textSize="16sp" app:cornerRadius="8dp" app:icon="@drawable/ic_share" app:iconGravity="textStart" app:iconPadding="8dp" app:iconTint="@color/GoldYellow" app:strokeColor="@color/GoldYellow" app:strokeWidth="2dp" />
</LinearLayout>
<!-- Image Gallery (for multiple images) --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginHorizontal="16dp" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" android:orientation="vertical">
<TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp" android:text="More Photos" android:textColor="@color/NavyBlue" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold" />
<androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView android:id="@+id/rv_image_gallery" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="120dp" android:clipToPadding="false" android:paddingStart="0dp" android:paddingEnd="16dp" android:visibility="gone" tools:listitem="@layout/item_gallery_image" />
</LinearLayout>
<!-- Bottom padding for better scrolling --> <View android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="32dp" />
</LinearLayout> </ScrollView>
